bio: Official page of the British Fashion Council. News on events including The #FashionAwards. Follow @LondonFashionWeek for #LFW and #LFWM.

list.comment: Announcing the BFC Designer Pop-up! The BFC will open the Pop-up at @thebicestervillagecollection on 1st November 2018, as part of a new partnership with The Bicester Village Shopping Collection. The ‘Business of Retail’ partnership kicks off with the launch of an exclusive boutique showcasing a unique edit of Britain’s most exciting fashion brands, including @christopherkane, @emiliawickstead, @marques_almeida, @motherofpearl, @nicholaskirkwood, @palmerharding, @roksandailincic and @teatumjones.

Calling all designers! Applications for BFC NEWGEN support June 2019 - February 2020 are now open. As well as ready-to-wear, the NEWGEN initiative now encompasses accessories including all categories such as shoes, bags, hats, jewellery & fine jewellery. Past BFC NEWGEN recipients include an exciting line-up of designers including @ashleywilliamslondon, @craig__green, @mollygoddard & @walesbonner. To apply visit britishfashioncouncil.com/newgen

1 day to go until the BFC Designer Pop-up opens at @bicestervillage! The new partnership with @thebicestervillagecollection will kick off with the launch of an exclusive boutique showcasing a unique edit of Britain’s most exciting fashion brands, including @christopherkane, @emiliawickstead, @marques_almeida, @motherofpearl, @nicholaskirkwood, @palmerharding, @roksandailincic and @teatumjones.

British Fashion Council is delighted to announce that Miuccia Prada will receive the Outstanding Achievement Award at The #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @Swarovski. The Outstanding Achievement Award celebrates the overwhelming creative contribution of an individual to the fashion industry, who throughout their illustrious career has constantly shaped and reshaped the fashion world through their innovation and creativity. Mrs. Prada will be honoured at this year’s ceremony on Monday 10th December at the @royalalberthall in London, for her outstanding contribution to the global fashion industry. To find out more visit fashionawards.com/news
The nominees for the Urban Luxe award are @alyxstudio, @marineserre_official, @off____white, @palaceskateboards and @supremenewyork. #FashionAwards #Swarovski
The nominees for the Brand of the Year award are @balenciaga, @burberry, @gucci, @off____white and @prada. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

The #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski will be hosted by British actor, writer and comedian @jackwhitehall & South-Sudanese British model and activist, @msalekwek on Monday 10th December at the @royalalberthall. To buy tickets visit fashionawards.com/tickets. 🎨: @jamesdavisonstudio

Iconic British designers @viviennewestwood and @burberry reveal a first glimpse of their limited edition collection launching December 2018. The collection of re-imagined styles is @riccardotisci first collaboration for Burberry as Chief Creative Officer and celebrates British style and heritage.

BFC Ambassadorial President @davidbeckham & 2018 #FashionAwards nominee @victoriabeckham on the red carpet at the 2014 Fashion Awards. To see the full list of the 2018 nominees & to buy tickets visit fashionawards.com @swarovski

The nominees for the Designer of the Year award are Alessandro Michele for @gucci, Clare Waight Keller for @givenchyofficial, Kim Jones for @dior Homme, Pierpaolo Piccioli for @maisonvalentino and Virgil Abloh for @louisvuitton. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

Backstage in the winners room at the #FashionAwards 2017 with last year’s Urban Luxe winner @virgilabloh. To see all the nominees and to buy tickets for the Fashion Awards 2018 head over to fashionawards.com #Swarvoski

The nominees for the Accessories Designer of the Year award are Alessandro Michele for @gucci, Demna Gvasalia for @balenciaga, Jonathan Anderson for @loewe, Maria Grazia Chiuri for @dior and Miuccia Prada for @prada. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

Yesterday @evening.standard unveiled their annual Progress 1000 list of London’s most influential people, which includes BFC Chair Stephanie Phair, BFC’s Ambassadorial President @davidbeckham as well as BFC NEWGEN recipients @_charlesjeffrey & @richardquinn. To see the full list visit standard.co.uk/the1000

Win 2 tickets to the BFC #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski! Simply tag a friend below for the chance to join the nominees at the Royal Albert Hall on Monday 10th December. Winners will be notified on Thursday 29th November via DM.

The nominees for the British Emerging Talent Womenswear award are Rejina Pyo for @rejinapyo, Matty Bovan for @babbym, Natalia Alaverdian for @awake_uk, Richard Quinn for @richardquinn and Sofia Prantera for @ariesarise. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

The #FashionAwards are the primary fundraiser for BFC charities including the BFC Education Foundation. The money raised at the Fashion Awards goes directly in to funding the progress of students, graduates and young fashion designers who spring from the education system. To buy tickets visit & to make a donation fashionawards.com #Swarovski
See the best of #BritishFashion this week including Megan Markle, Duchess of Sussex wearing @londonfashionweek designer @emiliawickstead. To see more visit pinterest.com/britishfashion
See the best of #BritishFashion including Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge wearing @londonfashionweek designer @emiliawickstead at pinterest.com/britishfashion

For 11 days only, the BFC Designer Pop-up will showcase a unique edit of Britain’s most exciting emerging and established fashion brands including @christopherkane, @eudonchoi, @marques_almeida, @motherofpearl and @roksandailincic. Shop the collections at @bicestervillage now!

The nominees for the British Designer of the Year Menswear award are Craig Green for @craig__green, Jonathan Anderson for @jw_anderson, Kim Jones for @dior Homme, Martine Rose for @martine_rose and Riccardo Tisci for @burberry. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

The BFC brings the best of #BritishFashion to Bicester Village for 11 days only! An exciting partnership with @thebicestervillagecollection aims to collectively support British designers through a tailored programme of business mentorship and commercial opportunity. The programme will give designers a new retail landscape, business development expertise and global exposure. Visit the Pop-up shop from November 1st with designers including @christopherkane, @emiliawickstead, @marques_almeida, @motherofpearl, @nicholaskirkwood, @palmerharding, @roksandailincic and @teatumjones. To read more head over to britishfashioncouncil.com/press

One month to go until the #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski! Don’t miss the opportunity to celebrate the most creative and innovative talent at London’s iconic @Royalalberthall. The Fashion Awards are the primary fundraiser for the BFC’s charities including the BFC Education Foundation and BFC Vogue Designer Fashion Fund; the legacy of the Awards is to secure the future generation of fashion talent while celebrating the outstanding contributions of current industry leaders. To buy tickets visit fashionawards.com/tickets

#TBT #FashionAwards nominee @lallo25 with @jaredleto at the 2016 Fashion Awards in partnership with @swarovski. The annual celebration of creativity and innovation will shine a spotlight on exceptional individuals and influential businesses that have made significant contributions to the global fashion industry over the past twelve months. Don’t miss the opportunity to celebrate the most creative and innovative talent at London’s iconic @Royalalberthall, buy tickets at fashionawards.com

Just announced! Mert Alas and Marcus Piggott will receive the Isabella Blow Award at the 2018 BFC #FashionAwards in partnership with @swarovski. Mert & Marcus will be honoured at this year’s ceremony on Monday 10th December at the @royalalberthall for their invaluable contribution to the global fashion industry. Find out more at fashionawards.com/News
The nominees for the Model of the Year award are @adutakech, @adwoaaboah, @bellahadid, @kaiagerber and @winnieharlow. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

#TBT last year at the #FashionAwards with @jourdandunn and this years Model of the Year nominee @winnieharlow. To see all the nominations for the Fashion Awards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski head over to fashionawards.com/News

1 day to go! For your chance to win 2 tickets to the BFC #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski & join the nominees at the @royalalberthall on Monday 10th December, simply tag a friend below. Winners will be notified tomorrow via DM

The #FashionAwards 2018 in partnership with @swarovski will be hosted by British actor, writer and comedian @jackwhitehall & South-Sudanese British model and activist, @msalekwek on Monday 10th December at the @royalalberthall. To buy tickets visit fashionawards.com/tickets. 🎨: @jamesdavisonstudio

The nominees for the Business Leader award are Jonathan Akeroyd for @versace, José Neves for @farfetch, Marco Bizzarri for @gucci, Marco Gobbetti for @burberry and Michael Burke for @louisvuitton. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

The nominees for the British Designer of the Year Womenswear award are Clare Waight Keller for @givenchyofficial, Jonathan Anderson for @jw_anderson, Roksanda Ilincic for @roksandailincic, Simone Rocha for @simonerocha_ and Victoria Beckham for @victoriabeckham. #FashionAwards #Swarovski

Highlights from the BFC Designer Pop-up in partnership with @thebicestervillagecollection. The two-year 'Business of Retail' partnership supports British designers and emerging talent offering business development and a new retail landscape. With only 4 days to go, discover designers including @christopherkane, @emiliawickstead, @marques_almeida, @motherofpearl, @nicholaskirkwood, @palmerharding, @roksandailincic & @teatumjones
